#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

  int t;
  string citire,cit1,cit2;

  cin >> t;
  for(int j=1; j<=t; j++)
  {
    cin >> citire;
    cit1=citire.substr(0,citire.size()/2);
    cit2=citire.substr(citire.size()/2);
    reverse(cit1.begin(),cit1.end());
    reverse(cit2.begin(),cit2.end());
    cout << cit1+cit2 << '\n';
  }

  return 0;
}
